'''Ubuntu Studio''' is an officially recognized derivative<ref name="Ubuntu Derivatives">[http://www.ubuntu.com/products/whatisubuntu/derivatives Ubuntu Studio Derivatives], Canonical Ltd., Retrieved on [[24 May]], [[2008]]</ref> of the [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] [[Linux distribution]], which is explicitly geared to general [[multimedia]] production. '''Ubuntu Studio''' is an officially recognized derivative<ref name="Ubuntu Derivatives">[http://www.ubuntu.com/products/whatisubuntu/derivatives Ubuntu Studio Derivatives], Canonical Ltd., Retrieved on [[24 May]], [[2008]]</ref> of the [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] [[Linux distribution]], which is explicitly geared to general [[multimedia]] production. The original version, based on Ubuntu 7.04, was released in the 10th of May, 2007
